body_html: @F3PiX @mkalininait I am beyond confused now. I interpreted #762 (comment) as "Google exports deterministically. With proper quotes so that commas in fields don't conflict with our separator". Is that assumption true? If yes: Maud, can you add a fixture file that reflects the output format Google Docs is using (see my other comment above)? Thanks!
